itemInfo.itemDesc: An essence extracted from Fruit of Destruction, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Can be made by combining other ingredients with Fruit of Destruction using Alchemy.

item.name: Fruit of Destruction
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Silver Azalea
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at the Northern Plain of Serendia and Lynch Farm Ruins. It can also be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.
